explains: n. 亲密；接近；密闭；严密

sentences.en: Closeness, for example, indicates intimacy or threat to many speakers.
sentences.cn: 例如，对许多发言者来说，亲近意味着亲密或威胁。

sentences.en: Intimacy is the feeling of closeness, of connectedness with someone, of bonding.
sentences.cn: 亲密感是一种亲密的感觉，与某人的联系及结合相关。

sentences.en: The closeness this system cultivates is reinforced by the institution of "advisory" classes.
sentences.cn: 这一制度所培养出来的亲密关系通过设立“顾问班”而得到了加强。
